text: KVKL is a non-commercial radio station in Las Vegas, Nevada, broadcasting on 91.1 FM. KVKL airs a contemporary Christian music format syndicated by the K-LOVE radio network. ==External links== *Official Website VKL Category:Contemporary Christian radio stations in the United States Category:K-Love radio stations Category:Radio stations established in 2006 Category:2006 establishments in Nevada VKL
title: KVKL
